languages.text: "Резонно. Лучше быть жив{mf|ым|ой} и бос{mf|ым|ой}, чем покойником в теплой обуви. Улавливаешь мой намек?"
"Fair. Better to be alive and barefoot than a stiff in warm shoes, you follow me?"
languages.original_text: "Резонно. Лучше быть жив{mf|ым|ой} и бос{mf|ым|ой}, чем покойником в теплой обуви. Улавливаешь мой намек?"

traits.locale_text: "Fair. Better to be alive and barefoot than a stiff in warm shoes, you follow?"
"Fair. Better to be alive and barefoot than a stiff in warm shoes, you follow?"
"Fair. Better to be alive and barefoot than a stiff in warm shoes, you follow me?"
"Fair. Better to be alive and barefoot than a stiff in warm shoes, you follow me?"
"Fair. Better to be alive and barefoot than a stiff in warm shoes, you follow me?"
"Fair. Better to be alive and barefoot than a stiff in warm shoes, you follow me?"

languages.text: 「暖かい靴を履いて死んでいるより、裸足でも生きている方がいい」
languages.original_text: "Fair. Better to be alive and barefoot than a stiff in warm shoes, you follow me?"

traits.locale_text: 「暖かい靴を履いて死んでいるより、裸足でも生きている方がいい」

languages.text: “我明白，光着脚的活人比穿着靴子的死人要强。你懂我的意思吧？”
languages.original_text: "Fair. Better to be alive and barefoot than a stiff in warm shoes, you follow me?"

traits.locale_text: “我明白，光着脚的活人比穿着靴子的死人要强。你懂我的意思吧？”

languages.text: «De acuerdo. Mejor estar viv{mf|o|a} y descalz{mf|o|a} que ties{mf|o|a} llevando zapatos, ¿lo pilla?».
languages.original_text: "Fair. Better to be alive and barefoot than a stiff in warm shoes, you follow me?"

traits.locale_text: «De acuerdo. Mejor estar viv{mf|o|a} y descalz{mf|o|a} que ties{mf|o|a} llevando zapatos, ¿lo pilla?».

languages.text: "Fair. Lieber lebendig und barfuß als tot und mit warmen Schuhen, oder?"
languages.original_text: "Fair. Better to be alive and barefoot than a stiff in warm shoes, you follow me?"

traits.locale_text: "Fair. Lieber lebendig und barfuß als tot und mit warmen Schuhen, oder?"

languages.text: « Je comprends. Vaut mieux être en vie et pieds nus que raide mort dans des bottes fourrées, pas vrai ? »
languages.original_text: "Fair. Better to be alive and barefoot than a stiff in warm shoes, you follow me?"

traits.locale_text: « Je comprends. Vaut mieux être en vie et pieds nus que raide mort dans des bottes fourrées, pas vrai ? »

languages.text: "Makul. Sağ olup yalın ayak kalmak, ayakları sıcak bir cesede dönmekten iyidir."
languages.original_text: "Fair. Better to be alive and barefoot than a stiff in warm shoes, you follow me?"

traits.locale_text: "Makul. Sağ olup yalın ayak kalmak, ayakları sıcak bir cesede dönmekten iyidir."
